page.title: 02GHOSTS OF BILBROOK. CONT....
page.content: ely. These happenings occur frequen- tly. Other people from the same village have had different expe- riences, another family said that at night time they can hear foot- steps that appear to be walking up and down the stairs. The worst happening was by the Blanchard family.Early one morn- ing when, Mrs Blanchard got up to cook Mr Blanchards breakfast she opened the cutlary drawer; to her amazement, a bread knife fl- ew out of the drawer, across the room and fell with a crash into the sink,Mrs Blanchard could not believe her eyes. Luckily no one has been injured so far.People still have these occurances regularly.
